data.lyric:
[ti:I Lived It]
[ar:Blake Shelton]
[al:Texoma Shore]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]I Lived It - Blake Shelton
[00:06.16]Written by：Ashley Gorley/Ross Copperman/Ben Hayslip/Rhett Akins
[00:12.32]Daddy drove the wheels off a flatbed ford
[00:14.90]Flies found a hole in the old screen door
[00:17.89]Granny said the dress that my sister wore
[00:20.63]To church wasn't long enough
[00:22.70]
[00:24.09]Mama poured grease in a Chrisco can
[00:26.59]Put a hundred thousand miles on a sears box fan
[00:29.75]Uncle Joe put tobacco on my hand where
[00:32.67]Them yellow jackets torn me up
[00:34.64]
[00:35.99]And I ain't making this up
[00:37.83]
[00:38.97]Oh you think I'm talking crazy
[00:41.38]
[00:42.93]In a different language you might not understand
[00:48.17]
[00:50.77]Oh that's alright
[00:53.15]
[00:53.96]That's just the kind of life that made me who I am
[01:00.17]
[01:01.05]Just taking my mind on a visit
[01:03.04]
[01:03.95]Back in time 'cause I miss it
[01:06.30]
[01:07.28]You wouldn't know to love it like I love it
[01:10.62]Unless you lived it
[01:12.04]
[01:13.57]And man I lived it
[01:14.84]
[01:26.01]Granddaddy smoked Salems with the windows up
[01:29.04]Drove me around in the back of that truck
[01:31.80]We drank from the hose and spit in the cup
[01:35.00]We all survived somehow
[01:36.83]
[01:37.65]Them old duke boys they're flattening their heels
[01:40.78]Hollywood was fake wrestling was real
[01:43.59]Wouldn't dream of spending that two dollar bill
[01:46.91]From pushing a lawnmower around
[01:48.74]
[01:49.88]I'd go back there right now
[01:51.72]
[01:53.03]Oh you think I'm talking crazy
[01:55.57]
[01:57.03]In a different language you might not understand
[02:02.28]
[02:04.84]Oh that's alright
[02:07.53]
[02:08.20]That's just the kind of life that made me who I am
[02:14.24]
[02:15.09]Just taking my mind on a visit
[02:17.15]
[02:18.16]Back in time 'cause I miss it
[02:20.21]
[02:21.41]You wouldn't know to love it like I love it
[02:24.78]Unless you lived it
[02:26.08]
[02:27.70]And man I lived it
[02:28.94]
[02:33.34]Oh man I lived it
[02:35.04]
[02:40.47]Oh you think I'm talking crazy
[02:42.90]
[02:44.50]In a different language you might not understand
[02:49.68]
[02:52.12]Oh that's alright
[02:54.86]
[02:55.43]That's just the kind of life that made me who I am
[03:01.63]
[03:02.45]Just taking my mind on a visit
[03:04.49]
[03:05.48]Back in time 'cause I miss it
[03:07.62]
[03:08.71]You wouldn't know to love it like I love it
[03:12.14]Unless you lived it
[03:13.51]
[03:15.11]And man I lived it
[03:16.70]
[03:20.77]Oh man I lived it
data.trans:
[ti:I Lived It]
[ar:Blake Shelton]
[al:Texoma Shore]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:06.16]//
[00:12.32]父亲开着车跋山涉水
[00:14.90]一路飞驰 在一所旧房子里暂时休憩
[00:17.89]奶奶说我的姐姐曾穿过那件裙子
[00:20.63]去往教堂 但她仍然意犹未尽
[00:22.70]
[00:24.09]妈妈在桌边涂抹着化妆品
[00:26.59]无惧路途 是个希尔斯购物狂
[00:29.75]叔叔给我了香烟
[00:32.67]我很羡慕别人的黄色夹克
[00:34.64]
[00:35.99]我并非胡言乱语
[00:37.83]
[00:38.97]你以为我在信口雌黄
[00:41.38]
[00:42.93]用不同的语言 你或许不明白
[00:48.17]
[00:50.77]那也没关系
[00:53.15]
[00:53.96]就是这种生活造就了现在的我
[01:00.17]
[01:01.05]只要牵起我的手 跟我一起重游往昔
[01:03.04]
[01:03.95]回到旧日时光 因为我很怀念过去
[01:06.30]
[01:07.28]你不会像我一样对往日充满怀念
[01:10.62]除非你曾那样生活过
[01:12.04]
[01:13.57]伙计 那就是我曾经的生活
[01:14.84]
[01:26.01]爷爷只能开着窗户抽烟
[01:29.04]我深深沉浸在那往日时光中
[01:31.80]我们偷偷喝酒 往杯子里吐痰
[01:35.00]却总能逃避惩罚
[01:36.83]
[01:37.65]旧日贵族走下神坛 接受新生事物
[01:40.78]好莱坞遥不可及 只有跟朋友一起摔跤才是当务之急
[01:43.59]梦想着可以挥霍两美元
[01:46.91]在推着剪草机的时候
[01:48.74]
[01:49.88]我现在就要回到旧日时光
[01:51.72]
[01:53.03]你认为我信口雌黄
[01:55.57]
[01:57.03]用不同的语言 你或许不明白
[02:02.28]
[02:04.84]那也没关系
[02:07.53]
[02:08.20]就是这种生活造就了现在的我
[02:14.24]
[02:15.09]只要牵起我的手 跟我一起重游往昔
[02:17.15]
[02:18.16]回到旧日时光 因为我很怀念过去
[02:20.21]
[02:21.41]你不会像我一样对往日充满怀念
[02:24.78]除非你曾那样生活过
[02:26.08]
[02:27.70]伙计 那就是我曾经的生活
[02:28.94]
[02:33.34]伙计 那就是我曾经的生活
[02:35.04]

[02:49.68]
[02:52.12]那也没关系
[02:54.86]

[03:01.63]
[03:02.45]只要牵起我的手 跟我一起重游往昔
[03:04.49]
[03:05.48]回到旧日时光 因为我很怀念过去
[03:07.62]
[03:08.71]你不会像我一样对往日充满怀念
[03:12.14]除非你曾那样生活过
[03:13.51]
